column4: flannel & others - thanks for the help.  but when I enter "sudo /usr/share/doc/libdvdread3/examples/install-css.sh" into the terminal as the instructions say, the terminal responds "command not found".
i'm guessing that entering a path =/= a command
the path is wrong for 6.10. it's /usr/share/doc/libdvdread3/install-ss.sh
